roleset.name: (cause to) thaw, or by metaphorical extension, become mobile, active again
roleset.note: UNFREEZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: unfreeze-v
example.text: When you have a minute , I 'll give me a call and I 'll come around and show you-2 how-1 *PRO*-2 to unfreeze the panel *T*-1.
